text: This is a blog post about the new animated series "Pokémon Concierge," which was produced by dwarf studios and streamed on Netflix in collaboration with The Pokémon Company. The show takes place at a Pokémon resort called the Pokémon Oasis, where the concierge Harumi interacts with various Pokémons and their trainers who visit. The post provides information about the production team and includes download links to the first few episodes of the series from different cloud storage platforms. It also encourages readers to follow the public account "影的后花园" (Ying de Hou Huang Yuan) or ID "BluFilm" on WeChat for more content related to movies and TV shows.
